note: Fish stocks are subpopulations of a particular species of fish which have common parameters such as location, growth and mortality which define their population dynamics.
title: Status of the world's fish stocks
subtitle: Fish stocks become overexploited when fish are caught at a rate higher than the population can support, and the ability of the stock to produce its [Maximum Sustainable Yield (MSY)](#dod:msy) is jeopardized.
sourceDesc: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations
